name: OnePlus Smartphone
description: Powerful smartphone with OxygenOS 15 and Android 15, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a 6.77-inch display. Ideal for performance and everyday use.

name: HP Pavilion Laptop
description: High-performance laptop featuring Intel i5 12th Gen processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD storage, and a 15.6-inch screen. Perfect for work and entertainment.

name: Nike Air Max Shoes
description: Comfortable and stylish running shoes made with mesh fabric in black/white. Available in sizes 6 to 11, offering excellent support and cushioning.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: Powerful Dell XPS 15 laptop with Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a 15.6" 4K Display. Ideal for professional use.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: The latest iPhone 15 Pro, featuring the A17 Bionic Chip, a Pro Camera System, Dynamic Island, and a 6.1" Super Retina XDR display.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Sony WH-1000XM5 Noise Cancelling Headphones with a 30-hour battery life and comfortable fit, offering Hi-Res Audio quality.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Apple Watch Series 9 with advanced health tracking, built-in GPS, an Always-On Retina display, and water resistance.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 featuring a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, included S Pen, and IP68 water resistance.

name: The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical fiction novel by Paulo Coelho, exploring themes of destiny and self-discovery. A captivating read for all ages.

name: Atomic Habits by James Clear
description: Atomic Habits by James Clear offers practical strategies for building good habits and breaking bad ones, leading to remarkable results.

name: The Silent Patient by Alex Michaelides
description: A gripping psychological thriller, 'The Silent Patient' by Alex Michaelides keeps you on the edge of your seat with its intricate plot.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad by Robert Kiyosaki
description: Rich Dad Poor Dad by Robert Kiyosaki is a foundational personal finance book that challenges traditional views on money and investing.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The first book in the magical Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling, a captivating fantasy novel for all ages.

name: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation
description: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation, offering 50 shades with an oil-free, medium to full coverage, and a matte finish.

name: MAC Retro Matte Lipstick - Ruby Woo
description: MAC Retro Matte Lipstick in Ruby Woo, known for its long-lasting, non-drying matte finish and highly pigmented iconic red shade.

name: Urban Decay Naked Eyeshadow Palette
description: The Urban Decay Naked Eyeshadow Palette features a mix of highly blendable mattes and shimmers for long-lasting wear, and is cruelty-free.

name: Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara
description: Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara provides volumizing and lengthening effects with a unique fanning brush, ensuring no clumps or smudges.

name: NARS Blush - Orgasm
description: NARS Blush in Orgasm, a silky, superfine micronized powder that provides buildable color for a natural, healthy-looking flush.

name: Men's Cotton Graphic T-Shirt
description: A comfortable men's cotton graphic t-shirt made from 100% premium cotton, featuring a regular fit and durable print.

name: Women's High-Rise Skinny Jeans
description: Women's High-Rise Skinny Jeans crafted from stretch denim fabric, featuring a high-rise waist, skinny fit, and classic 5-pocket style.

name: Women's Floral Print Midi Dress
description: A beautiful Women's Floral Print Midi Dress made from lightweight fabric, featuring a midi length, V-neck design, and a comfortable fit.

name: Unisex Classic Denim Jacket
description: A versatile Unisex Classic Denim Jacket made from durable denim, featuring button closure and multiple pockets, perfect as outerwear.

name: Unisex Comfortable Fleece Hoodie
description: Unisex Comfortable Fleece Hoodie with a soft fleece lining, adjustable drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbed cuffs and hem.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40
description: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 running shoes with responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and durable rubber outsole, ideal for road running.

name: Adidas Superstar
description: The iconic Adidas Superstar sneakers feature a classic shell toe design, leather upper, and rubber cupsole, making them a versatile casual shoe.

name: Bata Classic Oxford
description: Bata Classic Oxford shoes made from genuine leather with a lace-up closure and comfortable insole, perfect for office wear.

name: Crocs Classic Clog
description: Crocs Classic Clogs are lightweight, buoyant, and easy to clean, featuring ventilation ports and pivoting heel straps for comfort.

name: Timberland Premium Boot
description: Timberland Premium Boots feature waterproof construction, a premium leather upper, padded collar, and rugged lug outsole for durability.

name: Samsung Crystal 4K Smart TV (55 inch)
description: Samsung Crystal 4K Smart TV (55 inch) powered by Tizen, featuring a Crystal Processor 4K, multiple voice assistants, and a slim design.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 Console offers ultra-high speed SSD, ray tracing, 4K-TV gaming, and haptic feedback for an immersive experience.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
description: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen) with an improved audio experience, voice control with Alexa, smart home hub capabilities, and a compact design.

name: Canon EOS 200D II DSLR Camera
description: Canon EOS 200D II DSLR Camera features a 24.1 MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, Dual Pixel CMOS AF, 4K video recording, and a vari-angle touch screen LCD.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone
description: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone, weighing under 249g, features tri-directional obstacle sensing, 4K HDR video, and extended battery life.

name: Smartphone X
description: A powerful smartphone with a great camera. Long battery life.

name: Designer T-Shirt
description: Comfortable cotton t-shirt for daily wear. Available in multiple colors.

name: Book: The Future
description: An insightful read on technology and society. Award-winning author.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality sound with noise cancellation. Perfect for travel.

name: Smartwatch Z
description: Track your fitness and receive notifications. Waterproof design.
